title: Sydny .NET User Group: Rapidly Producing Real World IoT Projects – presented by Peter Cole
thumbnailDescription: Sydny .NET User Group: Rapidly Producing Real World IoT Projects – presented by Peter Cole

liveStreamUrl.description: Sydny .NET User Group: Rapidly Producing Real World IoT Projects – presented by Peter Cole

eventShortDescription:
Rapidly Producing Real World IoT Projects – presented by Peter Cole
 
I was given the challenge of producing a low cost customer tracking solution for the Microsoft Technology Centre in Sydney.
The team was astounded at how I made a working prototype in just 3 days, using open source technology, RFID tags and Azure IoT services. Come along and see how you can do it!
 
About the presenter:
Peter Cole, Technical Solutions Professional for Azure app development. He has a very diverse background in electrical engineering and naturally gravitated to IoT solutions. Combining his passion of electronics with his development skills allows him to rapidly prototype solutions on the Azure platform.
